title: Summer Fall Winter Spring
lyrics: dasi nuneul tteosseul ttae nae gyeote nega igireul like the rainfall snowfall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom ne yeope amureon mal gudi haji anhado mukmukhi nae dwieseo nal gidaryeo jugedadeon nae gyeote geureon nega idaneun sasiri cham mian hamyeon seodo neomu gomawo nunmuri na naneun maeil bam uri hamkkehan neowa na ulgo udeon sigan tteoollida jamdeul gi jeone baby everyday nan haengbokhae neo hanamyeon modeun geosi da gomawo dasi nuneul tteosseul ttae nae gyeote nega igireul like the rainfall snowfall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom ne yeope dasi gireul georeul ttae ne gyeote naega issgireul like the rain fall snow fall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom nae yeope when i feel so lonely neowa hamkkehaedeon manheun naldeuri himgyeoun harureul machigo nae chimdaee nuun nal joheun kkumkkuge hae neon maeil akmong ppunin nal naneun maeil bam uri hamkkehan neowa na ulgo udeon sigan tteoollida jamdeul gi jeone baby everyday nan haengbokhae neo hanamyeon modeun geosi da gomawo dasi nuneul tteosseul ttae nae gyeote nega igireul like the rainfall snowfall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom ne yeope dasi gireul georeul ttae ne gyeote naega issgireul like the rain fall snow fall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom nae yeope eonjerado hamkkehaejwo naui gyeote yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom hangsang ne gyeote just like the stars up high jam mot deuneun bami manha dasi tto nan ne saenggakman hada urimane gateun gongganeseo dasi manna ugo isseo ne saenggage jam mot deuneun i bam dasi gireul georeul ttae ne gyeote naega igireul ooh ~ oh oh oh oh oh oh oh ĐK: dasi nuneul tteosseul ttae nae gyeote nega igireul like the rainfall snowfall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom ne yeope dasi gireul georeul ttae ne gyeote naega issgireul like the rain fall snow fall yeoreum gaeul gyeoul bom nae yeope
